title.en: Akai Ito ga Tsunagaru Anata to Kiss ga Shitai.

altTitles.ja: 赤い糸が繋がるあなたとキスがしたい。

altTitles.ja-ro: Akaiito ga Tsunagaru Anata to Kiss ga shitai.

altTitles.en: I Want to Kiss You, the One Connected to Me by a Red Thread.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi to Boku no Hana Kuukan

description.en:
### I Want to Kiss You, the One Connected to Me by a Red Thread.

1. Mirai Chirari (ミライチラリ)
2. Love Encounter / Koi to no Souguu (恋との遭遇)
3. Late-Blooming Prince / Taikibansei Prince (大器晩成プリンス)
4. A Princess in Your Color / Kimiiro Princess (君色プリンセス)
5. Otome no Pumps (乙女のパンプス)
6. Start Line (スタートライン)
7. The Center of My World / Ore no Sekai no Chuushin (俺の世界の中心)
-Honoka and Ken are childhood friends who recently started dating. One day Ken spontaneously suggests they have sex and Honoka agrees!
8. Tall Girlfriend / Choushin no Kanojo (長身の彼女)
9. Lover with a Height Difference / Shinchousa no Aru Koibito (身長差のある恋人) *formerly Shinchousa no Aru Kanojo*
10. Kimi to Boku no Hana Kuukan (君と僕の花空間)
11. Pollen Girl / Kafun Shoujo (花粉彼女)
